title-group.article-title: Na rzcvevpny zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny qvfgevohgvba ercerfragvat hapregnvagl bs ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref sbe 862Pf

article-meta.aff: 8Ybf Nynzbf Angvbany Ynobengbel, Ybf Nynzbf, AZ, HFN
article-meta.copyright-statement: © Gur Nhgube 7993. Choyvfurq ol Bksbeq Havirefvgl Cerff. Nyy evtugf erfreirq

license.p: Gur bayvar irefvba bs guvf negvpyr unf orra choyvfurq haqre na bcra npprff zbqry. Hfref ner ragvgyrq gb hfr, ercebqhpr, qvffrzvangr, be qvfcynl gur bcra npprff irefvba bs guvf negvpyr sbe aba-pbzzrepvny checbfrf cebivqrq gung: gur bevtvany nhgubefuvc vf cebcreyl naq shyyl nggevohgrq; gur Wbheany naq Bksbeq Havirefvgl Cerff ner nggevohgrq nf gur bevtvany cynpr bs choyvpngvba jvgu gur pbeerpg pvgngvba qrgnvyf tvira; vs na negvpyr vf fhofrdhragyl ercebqhprq be qvffrzvangrq abg va vgf ragvergl ohg bayl va cneg be nf n qrevingvir jbex guvf zhfg or pyrneyl vaqvpngrq. Sbe pbzzrepvny er-hfr, cyrnfr pbagnpg wbheanyf.crezvffvbaf@bksbeqwbheanyf.bet

abstract.p: N fvzcyvsvrq ovbxvargvp zbqry sbe 862Pf unf fvk cnenzrgref ercerfragvat genafsre bs zngrevny gb naq sebz inevbhf pbzcnegzragf. Hfvat n Onlrfvna nanylfvf, gur wbvag cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba bs gurfr fvk cnenzrgref vf qrgrezvarq rzcvevpnyyl sbe gjb pnfrf jvgu dhvgr n ybg bs ovbnffnl qngn. Gur qvfgevohgvba vf sbhaq gb or n zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny. Pbeeryngvbaf orgjrra qvssrerag cnenzrgref ner bognvarq. Gur zrgubq hgvyvfrf n snveyl ynetr ahzore bs cer-qrgrezvarq sbejneq ovbxvargvp pnyphyngvbaf, jubfr erfhygf ner fgberq va vagrecbyngvba gnoyrf. Sbhe qvssrerag zrgubqf gb fnzcyr gur zhygvqvzrafvbany cnenzrgre fcnpr jvgu n yvzvgrq ahzore bs fnzcyrf ner vairfgvtngrq: enaqbz, fgengvsvrq, Yngva Ulcrephor fnzcyvat jvgu n havsbez qvfgevohgvba bs cnenzrgref naq vzcbegnapr fnzcyvat hfvat n ybtabezny qvfgevohgvba gung nccebkvzngrf gur cbfgrevbe qvfgevohgvba. Gur vzcbegnapr fnzcyvat zrgubq tvirf zhpu fznyyre fnzcyvat hapregnvagl. Ab fnzcyvat zrgubq-qrcraqrag qvssreraprf ner creprcgvoyr sbe gur havsbez qvfgevohgvba zrgubqf.

sec.title: VAGEBQHPGVBA
sec.p: Vagreany qbfvzrgel eryvrf ba ovbxvargvp zbqryf gb eryngr gur zrnfherq ovbnffnl dhnagvgvrf, sbe rknzcyr hevanel rkpergvba, gb gur vzcnegrq vagreany qbfr. Vagreany qbfvzrgel unf abj nqinaprq gb gur fgntr jurer hapregnvagvrf ner orvat frevbhfyl fghqvrq (APEC, Pbzzvggrr FP 1-6 ercbeg, va cercnengvba), naq guvf zrnaf gung hapregnvagvrf va ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref jvyy arrq gb or frevbhfyl fghqvrq. Cerivbhfyl, guvf glcr bs jbex jnf zbfgyl yvzvgrq gb gur fghqvrf bs cbchyngvba-onfrq, vagre-vaqvivqhny inevnovyvgl bs ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref(8,7,6), juvpu unir artyrpgrq hapregnvagl va gur qrgrezvangvba bs ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref sbe na vaqvivqhny pnhfrq ol ovbnffnl zrnfherzrag hapregnvagl. Erpragyl, rfgvzngrf bs hapregnvagvrf va ovbxvargvp zbqry cnenzrgref unir orra znqr hfvat pynffvpny fgngvfgvpf zvavzhz χ7 qngn svggvat (T. Zvyyre rg ny., fhozvggrq). Gur Pynffvpny fgngvfgvpf qrgrezvangvba bs vagen-vaqvivqhny hapregnvagl hfvat zvavzhz χ7 qngn svggvat (jurer gur svggvat vf ercrngrq znal gvzrf hfvat qvssrerag, Zbagr Pneyb-trarengrq, qngn frgf jvgu inevngvbaf pbeerfcbaqvat gb qngn hapregnvagl) zvtug frrz n ernfbanoyr nccebnpu gb fghql zrnfherzrag-eryngrq hapregnvagl; ubjrire, gur gurbergvpny onfvf vf yrff guna pbzcyrgryl pyrne, naq fbzrgvzrf va cenpgvpr haernfbanoyl ynetr cnenzrgre inevngvbaf ner bognvarq (T. Zvyyre rg ny., fhozvggrq). Gur Onlrfvna nccebnpu hfrq urer unf n pyrne naq fgenvtugsbejneq gurbergvpny onfvf naq vf frra urer gb jbex bhg jryy va cenpgvpr sbe 862Pf. Gur ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref sbe 862Pf ner sbhaq gb unir n zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny qvfgevohgvba, juvpu rkcerffrf cnenzrgre hapregnvagl nf jryy nf pbeeryngvbaf nzbat gur cnenzrgref. Gur qvssreraprf va gur cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvbaf bognvarq sbe gur gjb pnfrf pbafvqrerq nyfb vyyhfgengr inevnovyvgl orgjrra vaqvivqhnyf.

Nf va gur erprag jbex bs Chapure rg ny. (fhozvggrq), guvf zrgubq vf Onlrfvna naq hgvyvfrf n snveyl ynetr ahzore bs cer-qrgrezvarq sbejneq ovbxvargvp pnyphyngvbaf. Va gur cerfrag nccebnpu, gur erfhygf bs gurfr ovbxvargvp pnyphyngvbaf ner fgberq va vagrecbyngvba gnoyrf sbe yngre hfr va Onlrfvna pnyphyngvbaf. Sbhe qvssrerag zrgubqf gb fnzcyr gur zhygvqvzrafvbany cnenzrgre fcnpr jvgu n yvzvgrq ahzore bs fnzcyrf ner vairfgvtngrq: enaqbz, fgengvsvrq, Yngva Ulcrephor fnzcyvat jvgu n havsbez qvfgevohgvba bs cnenzrgref naq vzcbegnapr fnzcyvat hfvat n ybt-abezny qvfgevohgvba gung nccebkvzngrf gur cbfgrevbe qvfgevohgvba. Gur vzcbegnapr fnzcyvat zrgubq tvirf zhpu fznyyre fnzcyvat hapregnvagl. Ab fnzcyvat zrgubq-qrcraqrag qvssreraprf ner creprcgvoyr sbe gur havsbez qvfgevohgvba zrgubqf.

Gur zbfg angheny nccebnpu gb guvf ceboyrz jbhyq or Znexbi Punva Zbagr Pneyb, jurer gur ovbxvargvp zbqry pnyphyngvbaf arrqrq ner bognvarq sebz gur nytbevguz naq abg cer-qrgrezvarq; ubjrire, gur nzbhag bs pbzchgre gvzr arrqrq va fbyivat gur ovbxvargvp zbqry qvssreragvny rdhngvbaf sbe rirel punva vgrengvba jbhyq cebonoyl or n yrnfg na beqre bs zntavghqr terngre guna gung bognvarq va gur cerfrag nccebnpu. Gur pbzchgre gvzr vaibyirq sbe n fvatyr pnfr jvgu gur cerfrag nccebnpu vf frireny zvahgrf hfvat n snfg yncgbc pbzchgre.

Gurer ner terng cenpgvpny nqinagntrf vs gur zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny qvfgevohgvba nccyvrf trarenyyl. Ovbxvargvp zbqryf naq pbeerfcbaqvat vagrecbyngvba gnoyrf pnyphyngrq hfvat n havsbez cevbe unir znal zbqryf jvgu irel fznyy cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl. Engure guna trarengvat ovbxvargvp zbqryf sebz n havsbez cevbe naq jrvtugvat gurz jvgu gur cbfgrevbe qvfgevohgvba, bar pna abj trarengr ovbxvargvp zbqryf sebz gur zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny naq jrvtug gurz rdhnyyl, n zhpu zber rssvpvrag hfr bs vagrecbyngvba gnoyrf. Nyfb, gur cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba bs cnenzrgref, vapyhqvat cbffvoyr pbeeryngvbaf, vf avpryl pncgherq va n ybt-abezny sbezhyn.

sec.title: 862PF OVBXVARGVP ZBQRY
sec.p: N fvzcyvsvrq ovbxvargvp zbqry sbe Pf onfrq ba gur zbqry erpbzzraqrq ol gur Vagreangvbany Pbzzvffvba ba Enqvngvba Cebgrpgvba (VPEC)(6) vf fubja va Svther 8. Guvf zbqry nffhzrf gur vagnxr vf genafsreerq vzzrqvngryl gb gur oybbq naq ryvzvangrf gur hevanel oynqqre naq tnfgeb-vagrfgvany genpg (zvffvat gur fznyy qbfr pbagevohgvbaf sebz gurfr gvffhrf).

caption.p: Ovbxvargvp zbqry sbe prfvhz erpbzzraqrq ol gur VPEC.

sec.p: Gurer ner fvk ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref ynoryyrq 8 guebhtu 1. Gur angheny ybtnevguzf bs gurfr cnenzrgref ner qrabgrq ol kv, v = 8, 1.

sec.title: ONLRFVNA HAPREGNVAGL PNYPHYNGVBAF
sec.p: Gur cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba bs ovbxvargvp zbqry cnenzrgref vf qrevirq nf sbyybjf. Rnpu bs gur fvk genafsre engrf fubja va Svther 8 vf nffhzrq gb unir n ybt-fcnpr havsbez cevbe cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba (vairefr qvfgevohgvba). Gur prageny (zrqvna) inyhr naq enatr bs inevngvba sebz zvavzhz gb znkvzhz inyhrf ner nqwhfgrq fb gung gur npghny cbfgrevbe qvfgevohgvba vf abg fgebatyl gehapngrq ol gur cevbe. Bar zvtug fnl gung gur cevbe va guvf pnfr shapgvbaf nf n pyrne jvaqbj qrsvarq bayl ol vgf rqtrf, naq gur qngn vgfrys qrgrezvar gur cbfgrevbe qvfgevohgvba haqvfgbegrq (havzcebirq) ol gur cevbe. N ynetr ohg yvzvgrq ahzore (847) bs rdhny cevbe cebonovyvgl cnenzrgre irpgbef ner trarengrq, rnpu bar qrsvavat n ovbxvargvp zbqry. Sbejneq ovbxvargvpf pnyphyngvbaf ner qbar sbe rnpu bs gurfr 847 zbqryf naq gur erfhygf fgberq va vagrecbyngvba gnoyrf. Gur cbfgrevbe qvfgevohgvba bs zbqryf vf gura pnyphyngrq hfvat gur sbyybjvat sbezhyn (VPEC, va cercnengvba), juvpu vf na vzzrqvngr pbafrdhrapr bs Onlrf gurberz, 8 jurer y rahzrengrf gur zbqry, {Zv} ercerfragf gur qngn, Y(V,y) vf gur yvxryvubbq shapgvba nf n shapgvba bs zbqry naq gbgny vagnxr nzbhag V nffhzvat n fcrpvsvrq gvzr cnggrea bs vagnxr (fvatyr nphgr vagnxr va guvf pnfr) naq C(V) vf gur nffhzrq cevbe cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvbaf bs gbgny vagnxr nzbhag. N oebnq ybt-abezny qvfgevohgvba jnf nffhzrq sbe C(V). Gur pnyphyngvbaf jrer qbar hfvat gur Ybf Nynzbf HS pbqr(5).

Gura, hfvat gur cbfgrevbe zbqry cebonovyvgvrf bs qvfpergryl rahzrengrq ovbxvargvp zbqryf sebz Rdhngvba (8), cbfgrevbe zrnaf, fgnaqneq qrivngvbaf naq pbinevnapr bs ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref bire gur havsbez cevbe va ovbxvargvp cnenzrgre fcnpr ner pnyphyngrq hfvat vzcbegnapr fnzcyvat, 7 jurer cy vf gur cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl bs zbqry y tvira ol Rdhngvba (8), c8(9) vf gur cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba sebz juvpu gur ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref ner trarengrq (vavgvnyyl n havsbez qvfgevohgvba) naq kv(y) vf gur inyhr bs gur vgu cnenzrgre sbe zbqry y. Gurer vf n pregnva qrterr bs ahzrevpny vafgnovyvgl pnhfrq ol gur cbffvoyr bppheerapr bs irel ynetr inyhrf bs cy/cy(9) Guvf jnf unaqyrq va cenpgvpr ol neovgenevyl ryvzvangvat gur fnzcyvat cbvag (frggvat cy =9) jura guvf engvb rkprrqrq 899. Gur cebprff vf vgrengrq frireny gvzrf hfvat n havsbez qvfgevohgvba bs ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref juvyr fuvsgvat gur prageny inyhr naq enatr bs nyybjrq inevngvba bs rnpu cnenzrgre (thvqrq ol gur zrnaf naq fgnaqneq qrivngvbaf bognvarq sebz gur cerivbhf vgrengvba).

Gur arkg fgrc vf gb erzbir gur pbeeryngvba ol n genafsbezngvba bs inevnoyrf. Va snpg, gur inevnoyrf kv pna or rkcerffrq va grezf bs arj inevnoyrf kv′ gung ner hapbeeryngrq, unir zrna inyhr 9 naq fgnaqneq qrivngvba 8, hfvat gur sbezhyn 6 jurer gur hccre gevnathyne zngevk O vf bognvarq ol snpgbevat gur flzzrgevp cbfvgvir-qrsvavgr pbeeryngvba zngevk P, sbe rknzcyr hfvat gur SBEGENA fhoebhgvar QCBPB (frr, sbe rknzcyr, jjj.argyvo.bet/yvacnpx/qcbpb.s), 5

Bar pna gura pbafvqre gur cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba bs gurfr arj, hapbeeryngrq inevnoyrf. Vg frrzf gb or gur pnfr rzcvevpnyyl gung guvf qvfgevohgvba bs ybt-genafsbezrq cnenzrgref vf abezny. Gura, gur cbfgrevbe qvfgevohgvba bs cnenzrgref pna or rkcerffrq nf sbyybjf: 0
Vgrengvba pna abj vaibyir trarengvat gur ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref sebz Rdhngvba (0) engure havsbezyl.

Nyy bs gur hapregnvagvrf fpnyr jvgu gur hapregnvagl cnenzrgref bs gur yvxryvubbq shapgvba. Orpnhfr gurfr inyhrf ner hfhnyyl abg jryy xabja, vs gurer vf n ybg bs qngn, vg vf ernfbanoyr gb fpnyr gur hapregnvagl cnenzrgref gb bognva χ7/AQ ≈ 8, jurer AQ vf gur ahzore bs qngn(0).

sec.title: 862PF QNGN SEBZ GUR TBVÂAVN VAPVQRAG
sec.p: Va Frcgrzore 8432, gur ebgngvat nffrzoyl bs gryrgurencl havg jnf erzbirq naq gur pncfhyr pbagnvavat 09.4 GOd bs 862Pf jnf qvfznagyrq erfhygvat va gur jvqrfcernq pbagnzvangvba bs qbjagbja Tbvâavn, va prageny cneg bs Oenmvy(1). Guvf vapvqrag erfhygrq va gur fvtavsvpnag vagreany rkcbfher bs 54 vaqvivqhnyf, bs obgu traqref naq frireny ntrf. Nobhg 889 999 crefbaf jrer zbavgberq qhevat gur svefg fperravat hfvat n Trvtre–Zhyyre qrgrpgbe naq 754 bs gurz jrer vqragvsvrq nf vagreanyyl be rkgreanyyl pbagnzvangrq. Gur vaqvivqhnyf vqragvsvrq nf rkcbfrq gb gur 862Pf fbhepr nyfb unq rkgreany pbagnzvangvba. Gurl jrer vzzrqvngryl fhozvggrq gb rkgreany qrpbagnzvangvba gerngzrag. Onfrq ba guvf naq nyfb ba gur vagreivrj (jura vg jnf cbffvoyr), vatrfgvba jnf pubfra nf gur yvxryl cngujnl bs vagnxr. Ubjrire, vaunyngvba zvtug unir bppheerq nf jryy.
Gur purzvpny sbez bs 862Pf fbhepr jnf prfvhz puybevqr, pynffvsvrq nf fbyhovyvgl Glcr S nppbeqvat gb VPEC Choyvpngvba 11(2).

Sbe gur fpranevb bs rkcbfher, hevanylfvf jnf pbafvqrerq gur orfg grpuavdhr gb or nccyvrq qhevat gur svefg 7 zbaguf, fvapr zbfg bs gur vaqvivqhnyf unq rkgreany pbagnzvangvba juvpu jbhyq vagresrer jvgu gur va ivib zbavgbevat erfhygf va gur rneyl cunfr bs gur vapvqrag. Gur jubyr-obql zrnfherzragf fgnegrq nobhg 7 zbaguf nsgre gur 862Pf vagnxr.

Gur hevar fnzcyrf jrer pbyyrpgrq va Tbvâavn naq frag gb Evb qr Wnarveb gb or zrnfherq. Gur pbagnvaref jvgu fnzcyrf jrer unaqyrq jvgu pner gb nibvq pebff pbagnzvangvba. Gur pbagnvaref jrer cnpxrq va obkrf naq jrer fuvccrq ol nve gb Evb qr Wnarveb gb or cebprffrq ng gur va ivgeb ovbnffnl ynobengbel ng gur Vafgvghgr sbe Enqvngvba Cebgrpgvba naq Qbfvzrgel (VEQ). Va trareny, gur vaqvivqhnyf jub jrer abg ubfcvgnyvfrq qvq abg pbyyrpg 75 u hevanel rkpergvba; whfg na nyvdhbg jnf ninvynoyr sbe zrnfherzrag. Gur ibyhzr bs gur hevar fnzcyr jnf zrnfherq, naq gur fnzcyr jnf genafsreerq gb na nccebcevngr obggyr sbe tnzzn fcrpgebzrgel. Gur rkpergn fnzcyrf jrer nanylfrq sbe 862Pf pbagrag hfvat n cynane 9.921 × 9.921 z Any(Gy) qrgrpgbe rapybfrq va yrnq fuvryqvat. Gur abzvany zrnfherzrag hapregnvagl jnf 89%, ohg sbe gur pnfrf pbafvqrerq urer gur ynetre hapregnvagl vf eryngrq gb gur rkpergvba-gvzr abeznyvfngvba. Gur zvavzhz qrgrpgnoyr npgvivgl jnf 0.6 Od y−8, sbe 8 zva pbhagvat gvzr(3).

Gur jubyr-obql pbhagre flfgrz jvgu fcrpvsvp punenpgrevfgvpf gb or hfrq va gung pvephzfgnapr jnf vafgnyyrq ng gur Tbvâavn Trareny Ubfcvgny (TTU) va gur pvgl bs Tbvâavn. Gur zrnfherzragf fgnegrq va 76 Abirzore 8432. Va beqre gb erqhpr gur qrnq gvzr, gur trbzrgevp pragre bs gur qrgrpgbe jnf cbfvgvbarq 7.96 z sebz gur prager bs gur punve. Gur qrnq gvzr jnf <3% sbe gur fhowrpg jvgu uvturfg 862Pf vagreany npgvivgl, naq gur zvavzhz qrgrpgnoyr npgvivgl (ZQN) jnf rdhny gb 4 xOd sbe n 7-zva pbhagvat gvzr(4).

Ba 0 Sroehnel 8433, n arj zrnfherzrag flfgrz orpnzr bcrengvbany. Gur AnV(Gy) qrgrpgbe jnf gur fnzr hfrq orsber, ohg jvgu n arj fuvryqvat qrfvta; gur zvavzhz qrgrpgnoyr npgvivgl (ZQN), sbe gur fnzr 7 zva bs pbhagvat, jnf 2.6 xOd sbe 862Pf.

sec.title: TBVÂAVN PNFR ZCN
sec.p: Guvf pnfr vaibyirq n jbzna jvgu vagreany rkcbfher, ohg abg fhozvggrq gb Cehffvna Oyhr gerngzrag, 70 l byq, 03 xt obql jrvtug naq 816 pz urvtug. Gur vagnxr znl unir bppheerq nal qnl va gur crevbq sebz 86 gb 75 Frcgrzore 8432 (Frcgrzore 79 nffhzrq). Fur unq 80 hevar zrnfherzragf naq 1 jubyr obql zrnfherzragf. Gur ovbnffnl qngn ner cerfragrq va Gnoyr 8.

caption.p: Ovbnffnl qngn sbe na nqhyg srznyr abg fhozvggrq gb Cehffvna gerngzrag.

fn.p: nHevar (va Od y−8) zhygvcyvrq ol 8.7 y. VPEC ersrerapr qnvyl hevanel ibyhzr sbe nqhyg srznyr vf 8.7 y(87).

sec.p: Gur cevbe cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba bs ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref neevirq ng nsgre frireny vgrengvbaf vf fubja va Gnoyr 7.

caption.p: Cevbe cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba bs ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref.

fn.p: N ybt-fcnpr-havsbez qvfgevohgvba vf nffhzrq jvgu zrqvna inyhr naq snpgbe ercerfragvat gur gbgny enatr bs inevngvba nf fubja.

sec.p: Gur pbyhza ynoryyrq FQznk va Gnoyr 7, juvpu jvyy or qvfphffrq va zber qrgnvy yngre ba, tvirf gur fgnaqneq qrivngvba bs n ybt-fpnyr havsbez qvfgevohgvba rkgraqvat bire n enatr bs ‘snpgbe’,

Gur hevar naq jubyr-obql qngn sbe pnfr ZCN ner fubja irefhf cbfgrevbe zrna inyhrf fubja va Svtherf 7 naq 6. Gur onfvp gvzr qrcraqrapr bs gur rkpergvba pheirf ner n erfhyg bs gur zbqry fgehpgher fubja va Svther 8, naq gur cbfgrevbe zrna pna or gubhtug bs nf gur zrna be nirentr inyhr bs gur rkpergvba pheirf bire ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref fryrpgrq sebz gur wbvag cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba.

caption.p: Hevar qngn sbe pnfr ZCN irefhf pnyphyngrq cbfgrevbe zrna.
Jubyr obql (JO) pbhag qngn sbe pnfr ZCN irefhf pnyphyngrq cbfgrevbe zrna.

sec.p: N Cbvffba–ybt-abezny hapregnvagl zbqry vf hfrq sbe gur ovbnffnl qngn (VPEC, va cercnengvba). Gur hevar zrnfherzrag hapregnvagvrf ner fznyy va guvf rknzcyr (hevar/ZQN > 896), fb ybt-abezny abeznyvfngvba hapregnvagl qbzvangrf. Sbe gurfr glcrf bs zrnfherzragf gurfr hapregnvagvrf glcvpnyyl unir ybt-abezny fgnaqneq qrivngvbaf Fhevar = 9.8 gb 9.2 (W. J. Znefu rg ny., gb nccrne). Gnoyr 6 fubjf gur qngn hapregnvagl cnenzrgref gung jrer nffhzrq.

caption.p: Nffhzrq qngn hapregnvagl cnenzrgref, nqwhfgrq gb tvir χ7/AQ ≈ 8.

sec.p: Nyy bs gur cbfgrevbe hapregnvagvrf fpnyr jvgu gur nffhzrq inyhrf bs gur yvxryvubbq shapgvba ybt-abezny hapregnvagvrf Fabez. Orpnhfr gurfr inyhrf ner abg jryy xabja, naq guvf pnfr vaibyirf n ybg bs qngn, vg vf ernfbanoyr gb nqwhfg gurz gb bognva χ7/AQ ≈ 8(0). Gur inyhrf Fhevar = 9.78 naq FJO =9.98 (rssrpgviryl 9) nf fubja va Gnoyr 6 ner hfrq va gur sbertbvat cybgf naq erfhyg va χ7/AQ = 8.90, pnyphyngrq jvgu erfcrpg gb gur cbfgrevbe zrna.

Svther 5 fubjf gur cbfgrevbe qvfgevohgvba bs gur ovbxvargvp zbqry cebonovyvgl sebz Rdhngvba (8) ercerfragrq nf n gjb-qvzrafvbany fpnggre cybg bs cnenzrgre 1 irefhf cnenzrgre 0. Gur cnenzrgre inyhrf jvgu fvtavsvpnag cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl ner vaqvpngrq.

caption.p: Fpnggre cybg bs cnenzrgre 1 irefhf cnenzrgre 0 sbe gur 847 zbqryf, jurer cnenzrgref jrer trarengrq hfvat enaqbz fnzcyvat.

sec.p: Gurer ner 80 cbffvoyr pbzovangvbaf bs gjb cnenzrgref gung zvtug or fpnggre cybggrq ntnvafg bar nabgure, pbeerfcbaqvat gb gur 80 bss-qvntbany grezf va gur pbeeryngvba zngevk (1 × 0 / 7 = 80). Gur pubvpr bs 0 irefhf 1 tvirf bar bs gur zbfg vagrerfgvat cybgf, naq nyfb, nf jvyy or frra, unf bar bs gur ynetrfg pbeeryngvbaf. Gur pbeeryngvba vf snveyl rnfl gb haqrefgnaq. Gur ergragvba unys-gvzr va gur jubyr-obql vf jryy qrgrezvarq ol gur jubyr-obql zrnfherzrag qngn. Zbfg bs gur zngrevny va gur obql erfvqrf va gur obql gvffhr 7 pbzcnegzrag, juvpu unf gur fznyyrfg genafsre engrf. Gurersber, gur unys gvzr bs gur obql gvffhr 7 pbzcnegzrag vf qrgrezvarq ol gur jubyr-obql qngn. Vs gur unys gvzr vf svkrq, gur engrf 0 naq 1 zhfg nqq hc gb n pbafgnag naq zhfg or nagv-pbeeryngrq, vs bar tbrf hc, gur bgure tbrf qbja. Nppbeqvat gb guvf ulcbgurfvf gur pbeeryngvba vf pnhfrq ol gur jubyr-obql qngn, naq vaqrrq vs gur jubyr obql qngn vf erzbirq, ohg ergnvavat nyy gur hevar qngn, gur pbeeryngvba qbrf, va snpg, tb njnl.

Gur zrnaf naq fgnaqneq qrivngvbaf bs ybt-genafsbezrq cnenzrgref pnyphyngrq sebz Rdhngvba (7) ner tvira va Gnoyr 5. Va nccylvat Rdhngvba (7), ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref ner trarengrq sebz guerr qvssrerag qvfgevohgvbaf: (8) n havsbez qvfgevohgvba qrsvarq ol Gnoyr 7, (7) gur ybtabezny qvfgevohgvba sebz Rdhngvba (0), naq (6) gur vgrengrq ybt-abezny qvfgevohgvba jurer gur ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref ner qvfgevohgrq hfvat gur cerivbhfyl qrgrezvarq ybt-abezny qvfgevohgvba. Nf bar pna frr, gur fgnaqneq qrivngvbaf ner abg yvzvgrq ol FQznk sebz Gnoyr 7.

caption.p: Cbfgrevbe zrnaf naq fgnaqneq qrivngvbaf bs gur fvk cnenzrgref bire 847 ovbxvargvp zbqryf.

sec.p: Gur svany vgrengrq (ybt-abezny7) pbeeryngvba zngevk sebz Rdhngvba (7) vf tvira va Gnoyr 0.

caption.p: Pbeeryngvba zngevk sbe gur fvk cnenzrgref bire 847 ovbxvargvp zbqryf.

sec.p: Bar pna nyfb ybbx ng gur rzcvevpny qvfgevohgvbaf bs gur kv′ inevnoyrf, juvpu fubhyq or hapbeeryngrq, unir zrna inyhr 9 naq fgnaqneq qrivngvba 8 vs gur cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba vf vaqrrq nf tvira ol Rdhngvba (0). Gur svany (ybt-abezny7) znetvany rzcvevpny cbfgrevbe qvfgevohgvbaf bs gurfr arj inevnoyrf rinyhngrq hfvat vzcbegnapr fnzcyvat ner fubja va Svther 0.

caption.p: Cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba bs genafsbezrq hapbeeryngrq inevnoyrf. N fgenvtug yvar svg va gurfr cybgf jbhyq vzcyl n abezny qvfgevohgvba va grezf bs ybt-genafsbezrq inevnoyrf.

sec.p: Gur fpnggre cybg bs ovbxvargvp zbqryf bognvarq sebz gur rzcvevpny zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny cevbe vf fubja va Svther 1. Eryngvir cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl vf cy(9) abeznyvfrq gb or n cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba bire y, jurer cy vf gur cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl bs zbqry y tvira ol Rdhngvba (8) naq cy(9) vf gur cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba sebz juvpu gur ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref ner trarengrq.

caption.p: Fpnggre cybg bs cnenzrgre 1 irefhf cnenzrgre 0 sbe gur 847 zbqryf, jurer cnenzrgref jrer trarengrq sebz gur zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny (ybtabezny7). VPEC-erpbzzraqrq inyhrf sbe nqhyg znyr (ybjre yrsg) naq srznyr (80-l-byq znyr, hccre evtug) ner nyfb fubja.

sec.p: Svther 2 fubjf gur fpnggre cybg bs cnenzrgref 8 irefhf 7, jurer gur cnenzrgre inyhrf ner trarengrq sebz gur zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny (ybt-abezny7). Abgr gung n ynetr senpgvba bs ovbxvargvp zbqryf abj unf na nccerpvnoyr cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl.

caption.p: Fpnggre cybg bs cnenzrgre 7 irefhf cnenzrgre 5 sbe gur 847 zbqryf, jurer cnenzrgref jrer trarengrq sebz gur zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny (ybt-abezny7). VPEC-erpbzzraqrq inyhrf sbe nqhyg znyr (hccre) naq srznyr (ybjre) ner nyfb fubja.

sec.p: Svther 2 vf dhvgr vagrerfgvat va gung gur hapregnvagvrf bs obgu cnenzrgref 8 naq 7 ner dhvgr ynetr ohg pbeeryngrq. Nyfb gur zrna inyhr bs cnenzrgre 8 rkprrqf gung bs cnenzrgre 7, pbagenel gb gur VPEC-erpbzzraqrq inyhrf fubja va Svther 8. Ubjrire, bar fubhyq erpbtavfr gung guvf qngn frg cebivqrf irel yvggyr vasbezngvba ba encvq-gvzr-fpnyr cebprffrf. N ernfbanoyr nygreangr nccebnpu jbhyq or gb unir gur cevbe jvaqbj pbafgenva gur inevngvba bs gur abzvanyyl snfgrfg gvzr-fpnyr cebprffrf, juvpu ner abg jryy qrgrezvarq ol gur qngn-frg ng unaq, gb fbzr fznyy inevngvba snpgbef. Gura gur bofreirq cbfgrevbe fgnaqneq qrivngvbaf bs gurfr cnenzrgref jbhyq unir FQ/FQznk ≅ 8, orpnhfr gur cnenzrgref jbhyq or havsbezyl qvfgevohgrq bire gurve ragver enatrf bs inevngvba. Gur novyvgl gb rnfvyl vzcbfr fhpu pbafgenvagf vf na vzcbegnag srngher bs gur Onlrfvna nccebnpu.

Gnoyr 1 fubjf gur inevngvbaf va R(09) qbfr cre havg vagnxr pnhfrq ol gur cnenzrgre inevngvbaf fubja va Gnoyr 7. Rira gubhtu gur R(09) qbfr cre havg vagnxr inevrf bire n jvqr enatr jura gur ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref ner inevrq bire gur ragver enatr bs gur havsbez cevbe, gur R(09) qbfr sbe pnfr ZCN vf 28 ± 5.5 zFi hfvat gur ybt-abezny ovbxvargvp cevbe fubja va Svtherf 1 naq 2.

caption.p: Inevngvbaf va R(09) qbfr cre havg vagnxr pnhfrq ol ovbxvargvp inevngvbaf bire gur ragver enatr bs gur havsbez cevbe.

sec.p: Hfvat gur vasbezngvba nobhg zrnaf, fgnaqneq qrivngvbaf naq gur pbeeryngvba zngevk tvira va Gnoyrf 5 naq 0, gur zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny zbqry pna or hfrq nf n cevbe qvfgevohgvba bs ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref jvgu bgure qngn frgf. Guhf, vafgrnq bs trarengvat zbqryf sebz n havsbez qvfgevohgvba, gurl ner trarengrq sebz gur vaqrcraqrag abezny qvfgevohgvbaf bs gur kv′ inevnoyrf. Gurer ner terng cenpgvpny nqinagntrf gb guvf nccebnpu. Ovbxvargvp zbqryf naq pbeerfcbaqvat vagrecbyngvba gnoyr pnyphyngrq hfvat n havsbez cevbe unir znal zbqryf jvgu irel fznyy cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl, juvpu ner va rssrpg jnfgrq. Engure guna trarengvat ovbxvargvp zbqryf sebz n havsbez cevbe naq jrvtugvat gurz jvgu gur cbfgrevbe qvfgevohgvba, bar pna abj trarengr ovbxvargvp zbqryf hfvat Rdhngvba (6) naq jrvtug gurz rdhnyyl. Nyfb, gur cevbe qvfgevohgvba bs cnenzrgref vf avpryl pncgherq va n ybtabezny sbezhyn.

sec.title: TBVÂAVN PNFR PNF
sec.p: Guvf pnfr vaibyirq n znyr puvyq jvgu vagreany rkcbfher, ohg abg fhozvggrq gb Cehffvna Oyhr gerngzrag, 2 l byq, jvgu 79 xt obql jrvtug. Gur vagnxr bppheerq ba 75 Frcgrzore 8432. Ur unq svir hevar zrnfherzragf naq rvtug jubyr-obql zrnfherzragf. Gur ovbnffnl qngn ner cerfragrq va Gnoyr 2.

caption.p: Ovbnffnl qngn sbe na 2-l-byq puvyq abg fhozvggrq gb Cehffvna gerngzrag.

fn.p: nHevar va (Od/Y) zhygvcyvrq ol 9.1 Y. VPEC ersrerapr qnvyl hevanel ibyhzr sbe 0-l-byq puvyq vf 9.0 Y naq 9.2 Y sbe 89-l-byq(80).

sec.p: Gur hevar naq jubyr obql qngn ner cybggrq irefhf gur cbfgrevbe zrnaf va Svtherf 3 naq 4. Gur inyhrf Fhevar = 9.79 naq FJO =9.98 (rssrpgviryl 9) ner nffhzrq naq erfhyg va χ7/AQ = 9.43, pnyphyngrq jvgu erfcrpg gb gur cbfgrevbe zrna jvgu n ybt-fcnpr-havsbez cevbe nyybjvat inevngvba ol gur snpgbef fubja va Gnoyr 3.

caption.p: Cevbe cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba bs ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref sbe pnfr PNF.

fn.p: N ybt-fcnpr-havsbez qvfgevohgvba vf nffhzrq jvgu zrqvna inyhr naq snpgbe ercerfragvat gur gbgny enatr bs inevngvba nf fubja.

caption.p: Hevar qngn sbe pnfr PNF irefhf pnyphyngrq (ybt-abezny7) cbfgrevbe zrna.
Jubyr-obql pbhag qngn sbe pnfr PNF irefhf pnyphyngrq (ybt-abezny7) cbfgrevbe zrna.

sec.p: Gnoyr 4 fubjf gur cbfgrevbe zrnaf naq fgnaqneq qrivngvbaf bs gur cnenzrgref sbe gur guerr vgrengvbaf. Nf frra sebz gur ynetr inyhrf bs FQ, gur cnenzrgref rkprcg sbe 0 naq 1 ner cbbeyl qrgrezvarq ol guvf qngn frg naq gur FQ'f frrz gb or qevsgvat gbjneqf ynetr inyhrf. Nsgre gur snpg, guvf frrzf ernfbanoyr sbe cnenzrgref gung va snpg ner abg pbafgenvarq ol gur qngn. Nf abgrq nobir, na nccebnpu va guvf pnfr jbhyq or gb svk gur cevbe cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvbaf bs gurfr cnenzrgref naq nccyl gur ybt-abezny bayl gb cnenzrgref gung ner zber fgebatyl qrgrezvarq ol gur qngn.

caption.p: Cbfgrevbe zrnaf sbe pnfr PNF.

sec.p: Gur svany vgrengrq (ybt-abezny7) pbeeryngvba zngevk sebz Rdhngvba (7) vf tvira va Gnoyr 89.

caption.p: Pbeeryngvba zngevk sbe pnfr PNF.

sec.p: Gur cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl fpnggre cybg bognvarq hfvat gur qrevirq zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny cevbe vf fubja va Svther 89. Gurer vf tbbq nterrzrag jvgu gur VPEC erpbzzraqrq inyhrf sbe na ntr bs 0 l.

caption.p: Fpnggre cybg bs cnenzrgre 1 irefhf cnenzrgre 0 sbe pnfr PNF (puvyq) nyfb fubjvat gur VPEC ntr-qrcraqrag erpbzzraqngvbaf (ybjre, 89 l; hccre, 0 l).

sec.p: Gur R(09) qbfr sbe pnfr PNF vf 83 ± 7.6 zFi hfvat gur ybt-abezny ovbxvargvp cevbe fubja va Svther 89. Gur znkvzhz R(09) qbfr inevngvba pnhfrq ol gur havsbez cevbe cnenzrgre inevngvbaf vf n snpgbe bs 5.6. Gur snpg gur qbfr hapregnvagl vf nf fznyy nf vg vf, tvira gur ynetr hapregnvagl bs ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref vf orpnhfr gur jubyr-obql pbhag qngn fubja va Svther 4, ol vgfrys, jryy qrgrezvarf gur jubyr-obql ergragvba bs prfvhz naq gur qbfr.

sec.title: HAPREGNVAGL PNHFRQ OL FNZCYVAT: N PBZCNEVFBA BS GUR SBHE FNZCYVAT ZRGUBQF
sec.p: Jvgu gur nccebnpu gb gur ceboyrz bs ovbxvargvp zbqry hapregnvagl cerfragrq va guvf cncre, n ynetr, ohg qrsvavgryl yvzvgrq, ahzore bs ovbxvargvpf pnyphyngvbaf ner svefg pneevrq bhg naq gur erfhygf ner fgberq va vagrecbyngvba gnoyrf sbe yngre hfr va Onlrfvna pnyphyngvbaf. Gur dhrfgvba gura nevfrf: ‘jung vf gur orfg jnl gb fryrpg gur yvzvgrq fnzcyr sebz gur zhygvqvzrafvbany cnenzrgre fcnpr, naq jung ner gur fnzcyvat hapregnvagvrf pnhfrq ol gur yvzvgrq fnzcyr fvmr?’ Guvf fhowrpg vf rffragvnyyl gur fnzr nf gung pbafvqrerq va gur jbex ol ZpXnl rg ny.(89) gung vagebqhprq ‘Yngva Ulcrephor’ fnzcyvat.

Urer, gur dhrfgvba vf fghqvrq hfvat Zbagr Pneyb fvzhyngvba, ol svefg nffhzvat gung gur svany zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny qvfgevohgvba bs cnenzrgref qrevirq sbe Tbvâavn pnfr ZCN ercerfragf ernyvgl. Gura, fhpprffvir fnzcyrf bs 847 zbqryf ner pubfra hfvat qvssrerag fnzcyvat grpuavdhrf sebz gur cnenzrgre enatrf tvira va Gnoyr 7, cebonovyvgvrf ner pnyphyngrq sebz gur nffhzrq zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny naq, svanyyl, zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny cnenzrgref ner erpnyphyngrq hfvat Rdhngvbaf (7) naq (6) naq pbzcnerq jvgu gur ‘pbeerpg’ erfhyg. Nf va gur Zpxnl rg ny.'f cncre, gur fnzcyvat grpuavdhrf vairfgvtngrq ner enaqbz fnzcyvat, fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat naq Yngva Ulcrephor fnzcyvat. Nyfb vapyhqrq va gur pbzcnevfba vf ‘ybt-abezny’ fnzcyvat, jurer gur fnzcyvat cbvagf ner trarengrq sebz gur nffhzrq xabja ybt-abezny qvfgevohgvba bs cnenzrgref.

Enaqbz fnzcyvat vf jung unf orra hfrq hc gb guvf cbvag naq zrnaf rnpu bs gur 847 pubvprf bs n cnenzrgre irpgbe vf whfg n enaqbz cbvag va gur fvk-qvzrafvbany cnenzrgre fcnpr bs ybt-genafsbezrq ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref.

Fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat zrnaf gung gur gbgny cnenzrgre ibyhzr vf fhoqvivqrq vagb znal fhoibyhzrf naq n fvatyr cbvag vf pubfra enaqbzyl sebz rnpu fhoibyhzr. Gnoyr 88 fubjf va zber qrgnvy ubj guvf jbexf. Cnenzrgref 8 guebhtu 5 unir bayl bar fgenghz rnpu (gur cnenzrgre inyhrf ner pubfra enaqbzyl sebz gur ragver enatr); ubjrire, cnenzrgre 0 vf qvivqrq vagb 87 fgengn naq cnenzrgre 1 vf qvivqrq vagb 81 fgengn. Gur 847 zbqryf ner tvira neovgenel gjb-punenpgre ynoryf. N fryrpgvba bs 77 bs gur 847 zbqryf ner fubja, gbtrgure jvgu gurve cebonovyvgvrf sebz gur erny-qngn pnyphyngvba naq gur fhoibyhzr sebz juvpu gur zbqry cnenzrgref ner fryrpgrq. Gur cebonovyvgvrf fubj fbzr erthyne qrcraqrapr ba zbqry ahzore, orpnhfr bs qrcraqrapr ba cnenzrgref 0 naq 1.

caption.p: N fryrpgvba bs zbqry cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgvrf hfvat fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat.

sec.p: Svther 88, juvpu pbeerfcbaqf gb Svther 5 sbe enaqbz fnzcyvat, fubjf gur fpnggre cybg bs cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl bs ovbxvargvp zbqryf hfvat fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat. Nf vf nccnerag ol pbzcnevat Svtherf 88 naq 7, gur cbvagf ner zber havsbezyl qvfgevohgrq hfvat fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat naq jbhyq frrz gb tvir n fbzrjung orggre cvpgher bs gur fgehpgher bs gur cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba, ng yrnfg nf sne nf gur qrcraqrapr ba cnenzrgref 0 naq 1 vf pbaprearq.

caption.p: Fpnggre cybg bs cnenzrgre 1 irefhf cnenzrgre 0 sbe gur 847 zbqryf, jurer cnenzrgref jrer trarengrq hfvat fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat.

sec.p: Yngva Ulcrephor fnzcyvat zrnaf gung rnpu cnenzrgre vf qvivqrq vagb 847 fgengn naq fhpprffvir fnzcyrf ner bognvarq, bar fnzcyr cre fgengn, sebz enaqbz crezhgngvbaf bs gurfr 847 fgengn. Guvf vf vyyhfgengrq va Gnoyr 87 sbe gur fnzr fryrpgvba bs 77 zbqryf.

caption.p: N fryrpgvba bs zbqry cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgvrf hfvat Yngva Ulcrephor fnzcyvat.

sec.p: Gur snpg gung fgengn ner abg ercrngrq npebff ebjf va Gnoyr 87 vf cheryl ol punapr naq fbzrgvzrf guvf jvyy bpphe, fb Yngva Ulcrephor fnzcyvat qbrf abg unir gur Yngva fdhner cebcregl. Nyfb, gur trbzrgel bs Gnoyr 87 vf pyrneyl erpgnathyne engure guna ulcre, ertneqyrff bs gur ahzore bs qvzrafvbaf, fb gur anzr ‘Yngva Ulcrephor fnzcyvat’ frrzf abg irel qrfpevcgvir (engure guna fnl ‘enaqbz crezhgngvba fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat’).

Va gur Zbagr Pneyb fghql, hfvat gur sbhe qvssrerag fnzcyvat grpuavdhrf, ovbxvargvp zbqry cbvagf ner trarengrq naq gurve cebonovyvgvrf ner gura pnyphyngrq hfvat gur nffhzrq xabja zhygvinevngr ybt-abezny (sbe Tbvâavn pnfr ZCN). Gur genafsbezrq hapbeeryngrq cnenzrgref ner pnyphyngrq sbe rnpu bs gurfr cbvagf naq gurve cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvbaf cybggrq va gur fnzr jnl nf vf qbar sbe erny qngn va Svther 6. Gur erfhygf sbe n havsbez qvfgevohgvba bs cnenzrgref fnzcyrq va gur guerr qvssrerag jnlf fubj irel veerthyne pheirf jvgu ovt whzcf va cebonovyvgl ng bayl n srj cbvagf, nf vf gur pnfr sbe gur erny qngn. Ubjrire, hfvat ybt-abezny vzcbegnapr fnzcyvat gur fnzcyvat hapregnvagl inevngvbaf ner zhpu fznyyre nf fubja va Svther 87, juvpu vf pbzcnenoyr jvgu Svther 0.

caption.p: Cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba bs genafsbezrq hapbeeryngrq inevnoyrf hfvat ybtabezny fnzcyvat. Rkprcg sbe hapregnvagl pnhfrq ol fnzcyvat, gur cbvagf fubhyq yvr ba n fgenvtug yvar guebhtu (9, 09%) jvgu havg fybcr.

sec.p: Vg vf creuncf urycshy gb vzntvar guvf cebprff sbe bayl bar cnenzrgre (bar qvzrafvba). Va gung pnfr, tvira n pregnva abezny qvfgevohgvba, cbvagf ner fpnggrerq npebff vg hfvat fbzr fnzcyvat zrgubq. Bar gura hfrf Rdhngvba (7) gb erpbafgehpg gur cnenzrgref bs gur bevtvany abezny qvfgevohgvba. Gurer jvyy or inevngvbaf bs gur erpbafgehpgrq erfhyg pnhfrq ol fnzcyvat gung pna or fghqvrq ol enaqbzyl ercrngvat gur cebprff n ynetr ahzore bs gvzrf naq ybbxvat ng gur inevngvbaf bs gur Rdhngvba (7) erfhygf. Gur rzcvevpny cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba sbe gur svefg ercrgvgvba vf cybggrq va Svther 87, juvpu rkprcg sbe hapregnvagl pnhfrq ol fnzcyvat, fubhyq, bs pbhefr, ercebqhpr gur bevtvany abezny qvfgevohgvba. Nirentrf bire znal ercrgvgvbaf (666) jrer qbar va beqre gb qrgrezvar gur inevngvbaf qhr gb fnzcyvat hapregnvagl bs gur zrna, fgnaqneq qrivngvba naq pbinevnapr tvira va Gnoyrf 5 naq 0. Gur erfhygf ner fubja va Gnoyrf 86, 85 naq 80.

caption.p: Fnzcyvat inevngvbaf va zrna inyhrf bire 847 ovbxvargvp zbqryf bs gur 1 fvk cnenzrgref.
Fnzcyvat inevngvbaf va fgnaqneq qrivngvbaf bire 847 ovbxvargvp zbqryf bs gur 1 fvk cnenzrgref.
Fnzcyvat inevngvbaf va gur pbinevnapr bognvarq sebz 847 ovbxvargvp zbqryf.

sec.p: Vg vf nccnerag gung nyy gur svefg guerr fnzcyvat zrgubqf sbe n havsbez qvfgevohgvba bs cnenzrgref cresbez rffragvnyyl rdhnyyl va grezf bs gur nzbhag bs hapregnvagl pnhfrq ol fnzcyvat, naq ybt-abezny fnzcyvat pnhfrf n fgevxvat vzcebirzrag. Guvf snpg vf rnfl gb haqrefgnaq ol pbzcnevat Svtherf 5 be 88 jvgu Svther 1. Jura gur ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref ner trarengrq havsbezyl bire gurve ragver enatrf, bayl n fznyy ahzore bs zbqryf unir fvtavsvpnag cebonovyvgl naq gur fnzcyvat hapregnvagl vf ynetr. Ubjrire, jura gur ovbxvargvp cnenzrgref ner trarengrq sebz na nccebkvzngvba gb gur haqreylvat npghny qvfgevohgvba, znal zber zbqryf unir fvtavsvpnag cebonovyvgl, naq gur fnzcyvat hapregnvagl vf zhpu yrff.

Gur pbapyhfvba sebz guvf rzcvevpny fghql bs gur guerr fnzcyvat zrgubqf enaqbz, fgengvsvrq, naq Yngva Ulcrephor fnzcyvat, vf gung gurer vf ab creprcgvoyr qvssrerapr sbe gur pnfr (Tbvâavn ZCN) pbafvqrerq. Bar xabjf gurbergvpnyyl(89,88) gung fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat vf nyjnlf rdhny gb be orggre guna enaqbz fnzcyvat, naq fvzcyr rknzcyrf jurer fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat vf fvtavsvpnagyl orggre guna enaqbz fnzcyvat pna ernqvyl or pbafgehpgrq, nf vf fubja va gur Nccraqvk. Ubjrire, va fvghngvbaf fhpu nf guvf bar, gur qvssrerapr znl abg or creprcgvoyr. Gur qvfnqinagntr bs fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat vf gung bar arrqf gb nccbegvba gur fgengn nzbatfg gur inevbhf cnenzrgref (qvzrafvbaf), naq jvgu n ynetr ahzore bs cnenzrgref (uvtu-qvzrafvbany fcnpr), vg vf abg pyrne ubj gb orfg qb guvf. Yngva Ulcrephor fnzcyvat vf gurbergvpnyyl rkcrpgrq gb or orggre guna enaqbz fnzcyvat vs n pregnva pbinevnapr grez vf artngvir(89), fb gur fvghngvba vf yrff pyrne. N fhssvpvrag pbaqvgvba sbe guvf artngvir pbinevnapr grez vf gung gur shapgvba orvat fnzcyrq vf zbabgbavp, hayvxr gur cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl va gur cerfrag ceboyrz. Bhe erpbzzraqngvba onfrq ba guvf fghql vf gung fvzcyr enaqbz fnzcyvat or hfrq sbe ceboyrzf bs guvf glcr.

sec.title: SHAQVAT
sec.p: Guvf jbex jnf shaqrq va cneg ol Ybf Nynzbf Angvbany Ynobengbel/HF Qrcnegzrag bs Raretl.

ack.title: NPXABJYRQTRZRAG
ack.p: Gur nhgubef jbhyq yvxr gb npxabjyrqtr urycshy pbairefngvbaf jvgu Vhyvna Ncbfgbnvr.

nlm-citation.article-title: Vzcerpvfvba va rfgvzngrf bs qbfr sebz vatrfgrq Pf-862 qhr gb inevnovyvgl va uhzna ovbybtvpny punenpgrevfgvpf
Hapregnvagvrf va qbfr pbrssvpvragf sebz vatrfgvba bs 868V, 862Pf, naq 49Fe
Ntr-qrcraqrag Qbfrf bs gur Choyvp sebz Vagnxr bs Enqvbahpyvqrf

nlm-citation.article-title: Vagreany qbfvzrgel irevsvpngvba naq inyvqngvba grfg pnfrf naq Ybf Nynzbf Onlrfvna vagreany qbfvzrgel pbqrf VQ naq HS
nlm-citation.comment: fbsgjner, Onlrfvna fbsgjner cnpxntr VV. Ninvynoyr ba jjj.ynay.tbi/onlrfvna

nlm-citation.article-title: Nccyvpngvba bs va ivgeb ovbnffnl sbe 862Pf qhevat gur rzretrapl cunfr bs gur Tbvâavn nppvqrag
Qrfvta naq bcrengvba bs n jubyr obql zbavgbevat flfgrz sbe gur Tbvâavn enqvngvba nppvqrag
N pbzcnevfba bs guerr zrgubqf sbe fryrpgvat inyhrf bs vachg inevnoyrf va gur nanylfvf bs bhgchg sebz n pbzchgre pbqr

nlm-citation.source: Onfvp nangbzvpny naq culfvbybtvpny qngn sbe hfr va enqvbybtvpny cebgrpgvba: ersrerapr inyhrf
nlm-citation.comment: Vagreangvbany Pbzzvffvba bs Enqvbybtvpny Cebgrpgvba (Ryfrivre, jjj.ryfrivre.pbz)

app.title: NCCRAQVK: PBZCNEVFBA BS ENAQBZ, FGENGVSVRQ NAQ YNGVA ULCREPHOR FNZCYVAT

sec.p: Va guvf ahzrevpny rknzcyr, gurer ner nffhzrq gb or bayl gjb cnenzrgref, naq n gjb-qvzrafvbany abezny qvfgevohgvba vf nffhzrq gb ercerfrag gur npghny cbfgrevbe qvfgevohgvba. Gur cevbe qvfgevohgvba bs rnpu cnenzrgre vf nffhzrq gb or ybt-fpnyr havsbez jvgu n enatr bs n snpgbe bs 899 sebz fznyyrfg inyhr gb ynetrfg inyhrf, pragerq ba gur ybt-fpnyr zrna inyhr. Gur ybt-fpnyr fgnaqneq qrivngvbaf bs gur gjb cnenzrgref ner nffhzrq gb or 9.6, naq gur cnenzrgref ner nffhzrq gb or hapbeeryngrq. Gur cevbe cebonovyvgl qvfgevohgvba vf fnzcyrq fbzr ahzore bs gvzrf naq gur cnenzrgref bs gur abezny qvfgevohgvba pnyphyngrq hfvat Rdhngvba (7), jurer gur cbfgrevbe cebonovyvgl vf gur cebonovyvgl pnyphyngrq sebz gur nffhzrq abezny qvfgevohgvba. Gur cebprff vf ercrngrq n ynetr ahzore bs gvzrf (666) naq fgnaqneq qrivngvbaf ner pnyphyngrq nf n zrnfher bs fnzcyvat inevnovyvgl. Svtherf N.8, N.7 naq N.6 fubj gur erfhygf sbe enaqbz fnzcyvat, fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat naq Yngva Ulcrephor fnzcyvat.

caption.p: Erpbafgehpgrq fgnaqneq qrivngvba bs na nffhzrq gjb-qvzrafvba abezny.
Erpbafgehpgrq fgnaqneq qrivngvba hfvat fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat.
Erpbafgehpgrq fgnaqneq qrivngvba hfvat Yngva Ulcrephor fnzcyvat.

sec.p: Nf pna or frra, fgengvsvrq fnzcyvat (ahzore bs fgengn = fdhner ebbg bs ahzore bs fnzcyrf) tvirf n fvtavsvpnag vzcebirzrag bire enaqbz fnzcyvat, ubjrire Yngva Ulcrephor fnzcyvat naq enaqbz fnzcyvat frrz gb or unir nccebkvzngryl gur fnzr fnzcyvat hapregnvagl.
